main.docTitle:
Innovation and Technology Fund
Resolution of the Legislative Council
main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under section 29 of the Public Finance Ordinance (Cap. 2) on 30 June 1999.
main.leadIn: Resolved that with effect from 30 June 1999—

paragraph.content: there shall be established a fund to be called the Innovation and Technology Fund;

the Fund shall be administered by the Financial Secretary who may delegate his power of administration, including the power to issue funds warrants and the power specified in paragraphs 4 and 6, to other public officers;

paragraph.leadIn: there shall be credited to the Fund—

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: such appropriations from the general revenue as may be approved by the Legislative Council for the purposes of the Fund;

subparagraph.name: b
subparagraph.leadIn: all income received by way of interest, dividend or distribution in whatever form from—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: any loan, advance, investment or payment in whatever form made from the Fund under paragraph 4;

subparagraph.name: c
subparagraph.content: all sums received by way of repayment of any loan or advance made from the Fund;

subparagraph.name: d
subparagraph.content: the proceeds of the sale of any investment made from the Fund;

subparagraph.name: e
subparagraph.content: such donations and other moneys as may be received for the purposes of the Fund;

paragraph.leadIn: the Financial Secretary may apply moneys from the Fund for the purpose of—

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: financing projects that contribute to innovation and technology upgrading in the manufacturing and service industries;

subparagraph.name: b
subparagraph.content: financing projects that contribute to the upgrading and development of the manufacturing and service industries,

paragraph.continued: in accordance with such terms and conditions as may be specified by the Finance Committee;

paragraph.content: the Financial Secretary in his discretion may authorize the investment in such manner as he may determine of any moneys held in the Fund at any time.
